description: '''Joseph Haule''' (born December 29, 1975), popularly known by his stage name '''Professor Jay''', is a [[Tanzanian]] [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] recording artist, politician and former member of the Tanzanian parliament for Mikumi constituency. He is one of the prominent representatives of the "[[Bongo Flava]]" Tanzanian hip hop subgenre, which mixes elements from both Western hip hop and the Tanzanian tradition (including [[swahili language|swahili]] lyrics as well as an activist attitude towards Tanzanian social issues such as [[HIV]]/AIDS, wealth, inequality, and political corruption).
